sourcesContent:
My To-Do List

  • {{item.name}}
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent { items: { name: string, completed: boolean }[] = []; newItem = ''; constructor() { const storedItems = localStorage.getItem('items'); if (storedItems) { this.items = JSON.parse(storedItems); } } addItem() { this.items.push({id:this.items.length,name:this.items}); // this.items.push({ name: this.newItem, completed: false }); // this.newItem = ''; this.saveItems(); } editItem(index: number) { const newName = prompt('Enter a new name', this.items[index].name); if (newName) { this.items[index].name = newName; this.saveItems(); } } removeItem(index: number) { this.items.splice(index, 1); this.saveItems(); } saveItems() { localStorage.setItem('items', JSON.stringify(this.items)); } }
